statements: DELETE FROM hazardous_waste_disposal WHERE record_id = 100 AND compliance_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE regulatory_agency = 'EPA' AND compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant';
DELETE FROM HazardousWasteDocumentation WHERE disposal_location = 'Landfill' AND disposal_method = 'Incineration';
DELETE FROM compliance_certificates WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
DELETE FROM WasteDisposalManifests WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM HazardousWasteDisposalRegulations WHERE compliance_status = true;
